statements: DELETE FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 101 AND performance_rating > 4;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE goal_setting LIKE '%improve%' AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM EmployeeMetrics WHERE employee_id = 101 AND metric1 > 50;
DELETE FROM Goals WHERE employee_id = 201 AND goal_name LIKE '%improve%';
DELETE FROM GoalSetting WHERE employee_id = 2003 AND deadline < '2022-06-30'
DELETE FROM performance_reviews WHERE reviewer = 'John Doe' AND rating < 3;
